name: Rocket Marketing
tagline: A full service internet marketing Miami
description:
Rocket Marketing and Design is a full service Internet marketing and web design company in Miami, FL providing Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Google Places Optimization, Responsive Web Design, Pay Per Click, Social Media Marketing, Content Management, Mobile Marketing and more. The mission of Rocket Marketing and Design is to give businesses of all sizes the legitimate opportunity to use search engines as a means for expanding their business.
When handled properly, search engine optimization (SEO), allows businesses of any size to compete in almost any market. You can confide in Rocket Marketing and Design to treat your business with the care it deserves and provide you with the finest personal attention.
